text: Ti won ba si ja o niyan, so pe: “Emi ati eni ti o tele mi juwo juse sile fun Allahu.” Ki o si so fun awon ti A fun ni Tira ati awon alaimoonkomoonka (alainitira) pe: “Se e maa gba ’Islam?” Ti won ba gba ’Islam, won ti mona. Ti won ba si keyin (si ’Islam), ise-jije nikan ni ojuse tire. Allahu si ni Oluriran nipa awon erusin
